snippet: A college professor in Missouri recently ran a marathon while knitting a scarf over 12 feet long, weaving together pastimes first combined by an Englishwoman, Susie Hewer, in 2008.
abstract: College professor David Babcock ran Kansas City Marathon while knitting a scarf over 12 feet long, breaking novel record set by Englishwoman Susie Hewer in 2008; Babcock undertook challenge after befriending Hewer over social network.
lead_paragraph: A college professor in Missouri recently ran a marathon while knitting a scarf over 12 feet long, weaving together pastimes first combined by an Englishwoman, Susie Hewer, in 2008.

headline.seo: A Running Record Falls: Longest Scarf Knitted in a Marathon
headline.main: Knit One, Purl Two and Run 26.2
headline.print_headline: Task for Two Racers: Knit One, Purl Two and Run 26.2
